DataElementConcept.preferredName: Vital Signs Supplemental Qualifiers Dataset Study Protocol Defined Systolic Blood Pressure Upper Limit of Normal
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A dataset containing supplemental information, specifically non-standard variables, to parent records in the vital signs domain._The formal plan of an experiment or research activity, including the objective, rationale, design, materials and methods for the conduct of the study; intervention description, and method of data analysis._Clearly characterized or delimited.:The maximum pressure exerted into the systemic arterial circulation during the contraction of the left ventricle of the heart._The top value of the range of statistical characteristics that are supposed to represent accepted standard, non-pathological pattern for particular laboratory result or other quantitative parameter.
